definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Meanwhile, just a quarter of auditors moving to in-house roles in the City are women.
sentences.chinese: 同时，伦敦城内四分之一改为坐班的审计师为女性。

sentences.english: One-quarter of the country is reckoned as unproductive .
sentences.chinese: 这个国家有四分之一被认为是不毛之地。

sentences.english: Please subtract a quarter of the money for your own use.
sentences.chinese: 请扣除四分之一的钱由你自己支配使用。

sentences.english: And your clothes should feel just as fluffy with only a quarter of a dryer sheet.
sentences.chinese: 只用四分之一的防静电布一样可以使你的衣物蓬松。

sentences.english: more than a quarter had been off work for at least a week, the research showed.
sentences.chinese: 多于四分之一的人离开过工作岗位少则一星期。

sentences.english: Place a quarter-size spoonful of filling in the center of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 勺起四分之一茶匙的馅料放在皮的中央。

sentences.english: That’s nearly a quarter of the $2 billion basketball shoe industry.
sentences.chinese: 这几乎占据了20亿美元篮球鞋市场的四分之一。

sentences.english: It is said to burn ssbbww. com one fourth of the fuel of conventional diesel-powered cars.
sentences.chinese: 据说这款车的耗油量仅为传统柴油车的四分之一。

sentences.english: The U. S. accounts for about three-quarters of total military spending by all NATO countries.
sentences.chinese: 在北约的军事开支中，美国承担了四分之一。

sentences.english: FC Bayern DFB Cup campaign ended in the quarterfinals.
sentences.chinese: 德国杯止步于四分之一决赛。

sentences.english: In 1986, one in four people ages 25 to 29 had never married.
sentences.chinese: 在1986年，四分之一人在25至29岁之间未婚。

sentences.english: It is not the fourth size of one of your least provinces.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家还赶不上你最小的省四分之一的面积。

sentences.english: Around the world, almost a quarter of under-fives suffer from it.
sentences.chinese: 全世界四分之一五岁以下的儿童都患有这种病。

sentences.english: The yearly output of coal was quartered in a year.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭年产量一年中减少到原来的四分之一。

sentences.english: Ten and a quarter inches long, swishy, made of willow.
sentences.chinese: 十又四分之一英寸长，轻灵型，柳木。

sentences.english: Gather it with your left arm, then make another quarter turn to the left.
sentences.chinese: 用左胳膊拖起它来，再向左边转四分之一圈。

definition: a portion smaller than a half/the lesser part/the smaller part
